title: Info Request to help trouble shoot the black screen issue
body:
There have been a few people posting about receiving a black screen inside the LOL launcher window, so far seems to be either windows or MAC.

I was wondering if a RED could pass on some info about what they use to populate the window so i can hep trouble shoot the problem?
I am guessing it is browser based been windows that would be IE or safari, do the windows run off flash or Java at all or is that all handled by the client? 

If it is a browser, has RIOT done work to improve compatibility with the latest release of these and this is related to older versions of the browsers not having a required update or a new update that broke every thing? 

Also what URL's do you use to pull the content so i can try putting them in the trusted zone to test for security issues?

Unless you guys are working on it and know the problem??

Current related posts:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/LJP4Gw7n-mac-lolpatcherux-not-doing-anything-when-open
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/xc0E1Wuq-black-screen-problem-with-client
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/HXWHxhcX-black-patcher
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/trl1w6Ml-league-screen-not-working

replies.body:
>so far seems to be either windows or MAC.

There are others?

You'll probably have better luck of a red seeing this if you post it on the red boards. Citing all those other threads is really gonna help that happen.

Best of luck with this man; if you actually get correspondence with the reds and you help them change the code for the better (which is probably impossible).

Was more pointing out it wasn't just one :) 
Red boards?

Ah,

also by red boards, I mean...

oh man, I really gaffed that. I meant to say "Miscellaneous boards", and that's just what I ended up typing, probably because that's the only board I know where the reds are somewhat active on.

Now to ponder whether I should edit that post to fix it or not...
